Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.stage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FinishedController
    Specific controller of the part of the game where the game has ended.
    GameStageController
    Controller of the various stages of the game, which are: Setup, GodChoice, Match and Finished.
    GodChoiceController
    Specific controller of the part of the game where the players choose the gods
    MatchController
    Specific controller of the part of the game where the players face each other
    SetupController
    Specific controller of the part of the game where the players set up the their workers before the beginning of the match.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameStage
    The various stages of the game
